name: farm-management-backend
description: Farm Management API Backend with Express.js, TypeScript, and Firebase

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ALLOW_START_WITHOUT_DB=true ALLOW_START_WITHOUT_REDIS=true nodemon --exec "node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server.ts"
scripts.dev:3001: cross-env PORT=3001 NODE_ENV=development ALLOW_START_WITHOUT_DB=true ALLOW_START_WITHOUT_REDIS=true nodemon --exec "node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server.ts"
scripts.dev:mem: cross-env USE_INMEMORY_DB=true NODE_ENV=development ALLOW_START_WITHOUT_DB=true ALLOW_START_WITHOUT_REDIS=true nodemon --exec "node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server.ts"
scripts.smoke: cross-env USE_INMEMORY_DB=true NODE_ENV=development ALLOW_START_WITHOUT_DB=false ALLOW_START_WITHOUT_REDIS=true node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/scripts/smoke.ts
scripts.seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/seeds/index.ts
scripts.backup: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/seeds/backup.ts
scripts.migrate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/seeds/migrate.ts

author: Farm Management Team
